LanguageData.AYPassiveCooler.label: Passive cooler (Ammonia)
LanguageData.AYPassiveCooler.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation, this cooler uses ammonia treated charcoal to improve on evaporation rates. It is slightly more smelly as a result.
LanguageData.AYPassiveCooler_Blueprint.label: Passive cooler (Ammonia) (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYPassiveCooler_Frame.label: Passive cooler (Ammonia) (building)
LanguageData.AYPassiveCooler_Frame.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation, this cooler uses ammonia treated charcoal to improve on evaporation rates. It is slightly more smelly as a result.
